### Overland flow
For kinematic wave routing and local inertial routing 1D river and 2D overland flow. For the
local inertial routing 1D river and 2D overland flow, water balance errors are computed for
each land cell (total storage) considering both river and overland flow.

```{julia}
# | code-fold: true
generate_table(Wflow.LandHydrologySBM, :water_mass_balance_overland_flow; relative_widths = [3, 2, 1])
```
